rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming foyer with built-in storage for coats and keys. Designed with Art Deco detailing, such as geometric patterns and bold colors.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious area combining kitchen and living room in an open layout, featuring marble countertops with Art Deco accents and ample natural lighting from large windows.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An internal courtyard that serves as the heart of the apartment. It features water features, indoor greenery, and skylights to enhance natural light and ventilation, ensuring compliance with Vastu principles by promoting positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A modern bachelor pad bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a private balcony. The balcony is designed to maximize sunlight exposure as per Vastu, with Art Deco geometric designs.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom that offers flexible space for guest use or work. Equipped with a spacious balcony designed to enhance ventilation and natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-lit bathroom fitted with modern fixtures, incorporating Vastu principles for cleanliness and balance with functional design.
